Instruction: Melt the butter in a large saucepan on medium heat. Stir in the Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, sugar, paprika, salt, and cayenne pepper until combined. Bring the mixture to a boil, stirring frequently. Add the cooked pork and simmer until the pork is heated through.
Place the pork in a large bowl, then top with the sauce. Enjoy the pork and sauce on buns to make sandwiches.
